name: I'll Probably Think Of A Good Name Later
name_original: I'll Probably Think Of A Good Name Later
description:
Description: A short top-down shooter where you blow up alien ships in the desert. It's a small prototype with only a single short level, but promises to be a tad difficult the first couple of attempts.

Controls: Use the arrow keys or WASD to move the player's fighter. Spacebar, "Q", and "E", can be used to fire the fighters guns.
